plot: A young woman named Evanora goes on a quest to find a magical fruit in order to save her dying grandmother. Along the way she meets a wild man named Pax and learns the value of friendship, and sacrifice.
title: Valtheri
plot_es: A young woman named Evanora goes on a quest to find a magical fruit in order to save her dying grandmother. Along the way she meets a wild man named Pax and learns the value of friendship, and sacrifice.
